message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $250.
I'm interested in the product, but $250 is a bit steep for me. I'd be willing to pay $120 for it.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $180.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but $180 is still a bit high for me. I'd be willing to pay $150 for the product.
